body:
I am using [Yocto Project](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yocto_Project) on Ubuntu 17.10 inside a Docker container to cross-compile for armv8. The recipe I am using is for version 1.14.1 which patches the build process. You might have to do the same thing, Recipe for grpc 1.14.1: http://layers.openembedded.org/layerindex/recipe/86424/ Fix libraries installation for Linux: http://cgit.openembedded.org/meta-openembedded/tree/meta-networking/recipes-devtools/grpc/grpc/0001-CMakeLists.txt-Fix-libraries-installation-for-Linux.patch?h=master Fix grpc_cpp_plugin path during cross: http://cgit.openembedded.org/meta-openembedded/tree/meta-networking/recipes-devtools/grpc/grpc/0001-CMakeLists.txt-Fix-grpc_cpp_plugin-path-during-cross.patch?h=master Below is the Dockerfile I use: 
FROM ubuntu:17.10
ENV DEBIAN_FRONTEND noninteractive

# Make sure the package repository is up to date
RUN apt-get update && \
    apt-get install -y apt-utils && \
    apt-get -y upgrade

# Set the locale 
RUN apt-get install -y locales && \
    locale-gen en_US.UTF-8  
ENV LANG='en_US.UTF-8' LANGUAGE='en_US:en' LC_ALL='en_US.UTF-8'

# Install packages we cannot leave without...
RUN apt-get install -y git tig mc sudo openssh-server
# Make sure the directory exists, otherwise sshd will not start
RUN mkdir -p /var/run/sshd
RUN apt-get install -y screen

# Android Repo needs
RUN apt-get install -y curl git python3 python3.6

RUN apt-get install -y gawk wget git-core diffstat unzip \
        texinfo gcc-multilib build-essential chrpath \
        socat cpio python python3 python3-pip python3-pexpect \
        xz-utils debianutils iputils-ping libsdl1.2-dev xterm 
# add the apt-get clean

# ADD https://commondatastorage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo /usr/local/bin/
ADD https://storage.googleapis.com/git-repo-downloads/repo /usr/local/bin/
RUN chmod 755 /usr/local/bin/*

# All builds will be done by user teamcity because Yocto doesn't allow builds to be run as root
RUN groupadd -g 2000 build \
  && useradd -u 5000 -ms /bin/bash teamcity -G sudo,build
USER teamcity
# All my meta/layer and recipes are located in our on-premise source control
COPY ssh_buildprivate /home/teamcity/.ssh/id_rsa
COPY ssh_buildpublic /home/teamcity/.ssh/id_rsa.pub
COPY ssh_know_hosts /home/teamcity/.ssh/known_hosts


WORKDIR /home/teamcity

ENTRYPOINT ["/bin/bash"]

# Expose sshd port
EXPOSE 22
